root.name: Choice of the Dragon
root.description: Choice of the Dragon is a text-based RPG for the iPhone, iPod touch and iPad. Players take the role of the eponymous Dragon, who is just starting their career as a princess-kidnapping, gold hoarding, knight-eating machine. The dragon is faced with a series of dilemmas and your responses inform your stats, measured on a sliding scale of 3 different statistics. Depending on your stats, some outcomes can wound your dragon, cost you gold, or cause you to lose "infamy". Statistics Depending on your choices, your dragon's statistics slide on three different scales: 1) Brutality vs. Finesse 2) Cunning vs. Honor 3) Disdain vs. Vigilance As mentioned above, you also gain infamy and gold on your adventures.
